definition: variant of 紅運|红运[hong2 yun4]

sentences.english: Wherever Alfred goes he is sure to find his bread buttered on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 不管到什麼地方去，艾爾弗雷德總是鴻運高照。

sentences.english: I hope your new dewelling will bring you and your family loads offortune and good health.
sentences.chinese: 謹祝你的新居將爲你全家帶來鴻運。

sentences.english: " Lucky Strike " is a blue-blooded Mongorian.
sentences.chinese: “鴻運當頭”是一匹純種的蒙古馬。

sentences.english: Thank you for your stay at the Hongyun Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 感謝閣下入住鴻運大酒店。

sentences.english: I hope your new dwelling will bring you and yours lots of fortune and good health.
sentences.chinese: 希望你的新居爲你及家人帶來鴻運和安康。

definition: May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
old but still full of vitality (idiom)
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
Changxing county in Huzhou 湖州[Hu2 zhou1], Zhejiang
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
earliest extant Chinese encyclopedia from Wei of the Three Kingdoms, 3rd century, modeled on Erya 爾雅|尔雅[Er3 ya3], 18150 entries
full moon/first full moon after birth (i.e. entering the second month)
Live as long as the Zhongnan Mountains! (idiom)/Long may you live!
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert disaster
flight of the roc (used in names)/soaring flight
to arrive home/facing one's home/home-coming/(soccer) facing the goalmouth
